verified_news.title: Lindsey Halligan out as U.S. attorney following pressure from judges - The Washington Post
verified_news.summary: Halligan’s departure followed a pair of orders by federal judges in Virginia that sought to replace her and accused her of “masquerading” as U.S. attorney.

verified_news.title: Amazon gets approval to build massive retail concept in Orland Park - chicago.suntimes.com
verified_news.summary: The estimated 230,000-square-foot store will offer shoppers general merchandise and grocery items.

verified_news.title: Both astronauts that flew on Boeing’s troubled Starliner mission are now retired - CNN
verified_news.summary: Veteran NASA astronaut Suni Williams announced her retirement Tuesday. Her extended mission to orbit due to the troubled Boeing Starliner test flight was her final foray.

verified_news.title: Driver killed and several injured after train derails near Barcelona, local media report - BBC
verified_news.summary: At least 37 people have been injured, five seriously, in a second crash, after Sunday's two-train collision in Andalusia.

verified_news.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra color lineup looks pretty boring, and didn’t even copy iPhone orange - 9to5Google
verified_news.summary: New leaks have revealed the likely lineup for Samsung’s Galaxy S26 Ultra colors, and it sounds pretty tame. Leaker Evan...
